author: larryi
msg: Add a check for "ajpid12" ContextManager property and if found, use it to
override the ajpidFile.  This allows the ajpid file to be set with command

author: billbarker
msg: Cleanup the logic to find an error handler.
The old code wasn't setting the "server" on the request, so that everything was trying the DEFAULT virtual host.  Now everything gets set correctly to map the request.
